name: Taco Shooter Remastered v1.0
description:
-Taco Shooter Remastered-

The game where you shoot a whole lot of tacos but remastered!

In this game, there is 2 modes.

Single player, and Duel.

In Single Player, you have to survive the tacos for over 400 seconds!

But, along the way you will be able to pick up power-ups and ship upgrades to help yourself.

In Duel mode, you get to face off with each other.

You BOTH have to survive for as long as you can.

But instead of there being tacos to dodge, there is enemy ships! You and a friend have to try your best to survive for as long as you can.

Have fun with the game!
